## WorkspaceAudio class

Class for loading, storing, and playing audio for a workspace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class WorkspaceAudio 
```

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [load(filenames, name)](./blockly.workspaceaudio_class.load_1_method.md) |  | Load an audio file. Cache it, ready for instantaneous playing. |
|  [play(name, opt\_volume)](./blockly.workspaceaudio_class.play_1_method.md) |  | Play a named sound at specified volume. If volume is not specified, use full volume (1). |
